items.title: World Darts Championship: Van Veen, Humphries, MVG headline star-studded session
VI Live: Algerije op weg naar volgende Afrika Cup-overwinning
items.summary: Goedendag en welkom in de VI Live van zondag 28 december! De laatste zondag van 2025 zit vol met leuke wedstrijden, en in dit liveblog hoeft u niks te missen.

items.title: Aanvoerder Van de Ven met Spurs naar belangrijke zege op stadsgenoot
Crystal Palace v Tottenham: Premier League ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the 4.30pm Premier League kick-off ‚öΩ Scores | Table | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail John It‚Äôs a cold day in London, and Selhurst awaits the teams, who are both in the tunnel and will enter the pitch from the corner. Richard Hirst gets in touch: ‚ÄúWatching the video of John Robertson in the piece you linked to I was reminded not only of his ability but also of the state of the pitches. It really was a different game then: maybe football did begin in 1992!‚Äù Continue reading...

items.title: Bundesliga-topscorer Ailton koopt na 21 jaar zijn topscorerstrofee terug
items.summary: Kent u Ailton nog? Met 28 goals had de Braziliaan in het seizoen 2003/04 een enorm aandeel in de laatste landstitel van Werder Bremen, maar zijn topscorerstrofee was 21 jaar in andere handen. Nu heeft Ailton het beeld teruggekocht.

items.title: Demb√©l√© en Luis Enrique winnen de hoofdprijzen op awardgala in Dubai
items.summary: Er werden zondag in Dubai buitengewoon veel awards uitgedeeld op het gala van Globe Soccer, maar de hoofdprijzen gingen na 2025 naar Paris Saint-Germain. De club in Qatarese handen werd in het Midden-Oosten bekroond met onder meer de beste speler (Ousmane Demb√©l√©) en de beste trainer (Luis Enrique).

items.title: Afcon roundup: Mozambique stun Gabon to end 40-year wait for win
items.summary: Bangal, Catamo and Calila score in 3-2 victory Sudan beat Equatorial Guinea 1-0 thanks to own goal Mozambique ended a 40-year wait for victory at the Africa Cup of Nations as they beat Gabon 3-2 in Agadir. Goals from Faisal Bangal, Geny Catamo and Diogo Calila earned the southern African side a deserved victory in which they were led by 42-year-old winger Elias Pelembe. It is their first win at the continental finals since their debut in 1986 in what was their 17th game. This story will be updated Continue reading...

items.title: Kyrgios beats Sabalenka in 'Battle of the Sexes' showdown
items.summary: Nick Kyrgios came out on top in the latest 'Battle of the Sexes' exhibition match with a straight-sets victory over women's world No 1 Aryna Sabalenka in Dubai.

items.title: The Telegraph: Roefs en Timber behoren tot 30 beste Premier League-voetballers
items.summary: Robin Roefs en Jurri√´n Timber zijn door The Telegraph opgenomen in een lijst met de beste dertig Premier League-voetballers op dit moment. De doelman van Sunderland is bezig aan geweldig debuutjaar in Engeland, terwijl Timber bezig is aan zijn derde seizoen bij The Gunners . De voormalig Ajacied behoort zelfs tot de toptien van het lijstje.

items.title: Van Dijk: More to come from Wirtz for Liverpool
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk has heaped praise on teammate Florian Wirtz and backed him to continue delivering for Liverpool after he scored his first goal for the club in Saturday's 2-1 victory over Wolverhampton Wanderers.

items.title: √òdegaard: Rice has put Arsenal in charge again
items.summary: Martin Odegaard believes Declan Rice's "unbelievable" performance as an emergency right-back demonstrates that Arsenal are "ready to do whatever it takes" to win the Premier League.

items.title: James: Only Chelsea to blame for Villa collapse
items.summary: Captain Reece James feels Chelsea have themselves to blame after throwing away a half-time lead to lose 2-1 to Aston Villa.

items.title: Anderson wins Ally Pally classic as Cross sets up Littler clash
items.summary: Gary Anderson edged out Jermaine Wattimena in a seven-set thriller at Alexandra Palace to reach the last 16 of the World Darts Championship.

items.title: Calvert-Lewin continues hot streak to earn Leeds point at Sunderland
items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin‚Äôs startling metamorphosis from forgotten man to a striker on the verge of an England recall continued as his seventh goal in six games further reinforced Daniel Farke‚Äôs job security at Leeds. A month ago Farke was rumoured to be under severe pressure at Elland Road but a change of formation and, most importantly, Calvert-Lewin‚Äôs renaissance have gone a long way towards assuaging relegation fears. Continue reading...

items.title: Pulisic nets in Milan win, on pace for best campaign
items.summary: Christian Pulisic is on pace for the best season of his career -- in a season that will conclude with a home World Cup played in the United States.

items.title: Calvert-Lewin scores AGAIN as Leeds secure point at Sunderland
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Sunderland‚Äôs draw against Leeds in the Premier League.

items.title: Calvert-Lewin continues scoring run as Leeds secure point at Sunderland
items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin's incredible goalscoring run continued as he found the net in a sixth consecutive Premier League game to secure Leeds a 1-1 draw at Sunderland.

items.title: Andy Carroll to appear in court after arrest and charge for breaching order
items.summary: Carroll charged with breaching non-molestation order Former England striker due in court on Tuesday The former England striker Andy Carroll has been charged with breaching a non-molestation order and is set to appear in court on Tuesday. Carroll, who was capped nine times by England and played for Newcastle and Liverpool, was arrested in April after allegedly committing an offence the previous month. Continue reading...

items.title: Liverpool set-piece problems a 'killer' - Van Dijk
items.summary: Virgil van Dijk says that Liverpool's problems from set-pieces "hurts" and that the second phase is a "killer" for them.

items.title: Chelsea investigate after bottle thrown at Villa bench
items.summary: Chelsea will look into an incident after a plastic bottle containing what looked like water was thrown at Aston Villa's staff and players.
